user.title: Google Cloud STT
user.description: Enter the path to your Google Cloud Service Account JSON file. Please note that the path is relative to the Home Assistant configuration directory. Guide on how to obtain the service account JSON file can be found [here](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/google_cloud#obtaining-an-api-key).

error.file_not_found: The specified service account file does not exist. Please check the path and try again.

create_entry.default: Google Cloud STT integration has been successfully set up and you can now use it with Assist.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_file_not_fo.title: The Google Cloud STT integration cannot be imported
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_file_not_fo.description: Can't import the Google Cloud STT integration because the specified service account file does not exist. Please check the path and add the integration using the UI.
